machine_end_gcode.default_value:
;End Gcode for {machine_name}
;Author: Dagoma
M104 S0
M107 ;stop fan
M140 S0 ;heated bed heater off (if you have it)
G91 ;relative positioning
G91 ;Relative positioning
G1 E-100 F6000;
G1 E2 F500
G0 Z15 ;Withdraw
G90 ; Absolute positioning
M0 Confirm Bed Free ;Wait user confirm to avoid hit
G0 F2000 Z529
M0 Click For Homing ;Wait user confirm to avoid hit
G28
